projects.name: Fatigue+
projects.description: Fatigue+ is a lightweight, immersive Minecraft mod that simulates sleep deprivation. Designed for Minecraft 1.8.9 (Forge) and built to work client-side only, this mod tracks how long youâ€™ve stayed awake and progressively makes your experience more difficult.

projects.name: Veyzen Client
projects.description: Veyzen Client is a Minecraft 1.8.9 forge-based client which is built to improve performance. It has a wide variety of mods which can significantly help you in game.
